created_by_me.description: Filter to show only events created by the current user. If not specified, shows all events.

start.description: Filter events with start time on or after this date. Use RFC3339 format or 'today'. If only 'start' is specified, returns future events in ascending order (limited to 5 items).

end.description: Filter events with start time on or before this date. Use RFC3339 format or 'today'. If only 'end' is specified, returns past events in descending order (limited to 5 items).
